name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a dedicated Middle Full-Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in developing dynamic, high-performance applications using **React.js**, **.NET**, **C#**, and **ASP.NET Core**. My skill set includes building intuitive user interfaces with **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**, alongside implementing state management solutions with **Redux** and crafting **RESTful APIs**. I have a strong command of **SQL** databases like **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, ensuring data integrity and efficiency. 
I also possess experience in cloud environments, particularly **Azure**, and containerization with **Docker**, which enhances deployment and scalability. My expertise in Agile methodologies includes proficiency in **Scrum**, enabling effective collaboration within cross-functional teams. 
Additionally, I bring robust problem-solving abilities and enhance teamwork through clear communication, striving to deliver compliant and secure software solutions.
